text: Systema Naturae (sometimes written ) is the main work of Carl Linnaeus, where he listed and classified the known species of plants, animals, and minerals. The first edition was made of only seven folios. ==Editions== Many editions of Systema Naturae exist, including the 10th edition of Systema Naturae, which is a book written by Swedish naturalist Carl Linnaeus and published in two volumes in 1758 and 1759. ==References== Category:Taxonomy Category:Biology books Category:1750s books
title: Systema Naturae
